short_summary: Canada is seeking offers Commercial Grade Washers and Dryers
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME and other details...
full_summary:
# Government of Canada
## Tender Announcement
### Commercial Grade Washers and Dryers

**Tender Reference Number:** WS4341603396
**Amendment Number:** 7
**Publication Date:** February 28, 2024
**Tender Closing Date:** Wednesday, April 17, 2024 @ 2:00 PM EDT

**Notice Type:**
A Request for Proposal for the purchase of Commercial Grade Washers and Dryers has been issued.

**Procurement Method:**
Competitive and Open Bidding will be used to select the preferred supplier.

**Expected Contract Duration:**
Start and End dates have not been defined.

**Bid Solicitation:** Canada seeks to acquire commercial-grade washers and dryers for the Department of National Defence.

**Regions of Delivery:** Ontario, excluding the National Capital Region.

**Trade Agreements:** This tender complies with the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA).

**Language:** French and English will be used in the solicitation process.

**Contact Information:**
- **Christopher Casale (SPAC/PSPC)**
- **christopher.casale@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca**

**Further Information:**
A pre-listing information session will not be held for this tender. The solicitation package and terms and conditions can be found at [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18931940](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18931940?extsite=MTg5MzE5NDBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).

### Eligibility

All suppliers must meet the certifiable set of requirements to be declared responsive to the tender. The government is seeking the lowest price, and bidders must be registered on the List of Producers for Goods and Supplies.

### Tendering Information

- Suppliers must submit their responses on 17 April, 2024, by 2:00 PM EDT.
- Suppliers who submit after the specified deadline will be disqualified.
- All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be received on the specified date and hour. 

Please note that all suppliers will be required to meet a business number in order to receive payment for services provided. This information will be available once your organization is accepted as a supplier on the government's contract opportunities responder.

 Supplier must also upload a WS GOP Form ( WS4341603396 copied below ) before converting to CSV in csv format
